extendedInfo.description: Dual core and higher ONLY!!!A RPG action saga set in medieval time in full 3D environment.  Hero, pick up a weapon and defend your world. Fight against Undead Legion from dark underworld known as World of Anargor. We are counting on you, you are chosen by gods and please stop the madness.----- IN GAME EXPERIENCE - FREE TO PLAY -----*** Excellent fantasy 3D RPG game*** Powered by Unity3D engine*** Travel through the realistic world with magnificent  graphics and sound set in the medieval times.*** Enjoy the real time melee combat face to face.*** 9 massive and detailed levels free to play (and more to follow soon) as RPG.*** Try to complete quests and missions  in order to save the World.*** 3 Different types of main Heroes (knight, dwarf and elf)*** Over 20 amazing enemy types (wolves, skeletons, orks, spiders ...) in game, each with their own  unique attacks and strategies.*** Range of equipment (more than 50)  will help you to go through the troubles.*** Stimulating background music and great sound effects.*** Astounding visual effects like fireballs, freezing, thunderbolt, storm  and more make your playing and magical attacks stunning to see.*** Options to control camera and view - bird or  fight mode view.----- MANY OPTIONS AVAILABLE TO PROGRESS ------ *** Watch tutorial video for understanding the game play.*** Collect gold coins after beating the enemies.*** Customize your Hero with a range of new weapons, armors or shields in game using collected coins or purchased gems.*** Use special magic and spells to defeat enemy or increase you health or strength.*** Notifications and pop-ups to guide the players.*** Find secret features, quests and weapons in every level.*** Buy health and mana bottles to increase you vitality and astral points. *** Save and load game whenever you want.*** Detailed mini maps will help you to find your way around and to solve the quest.*** Gain experience points with each completed quest and unlock new features as you level up.Requirements:Please keep in mind that World of Anargor is not created and recommended for single core devices. Dual core and quad core devices are preferred. Visit Anargor page â http://www.anargor.com  Like us on  http://www.facebook.com/pages/Anargor/219225391530002

reviews.title: Too hard! :P
reviews.comment: Yeah, the graphics are great, but ain\'t it a wee bit TOO HARD??? You don\'t regenerate health and money is scarce....played a while, then I could not get past lvl 3. Oh well....2 stars :P
reviews.author: Mary The Weirdo

reviews.title: Pretty bad
reviews.comment: I don\'t like it u can die so easy like health regen anyone then u can\'t aim with the bow like what please fix because I died 10 Times in 5 mins of play
reviews.author: Kiara Hinton

reviews.title: It\'s good but.....
reviews.comment: How is it possible!?! 3 stars for now!!! Hint to make it 5 stars. Make it easyer!!! And make as practice!!! I still have the game !!!
reviews.author: Jennifer Coisman

reviews.title: LoL
reviews.comment: Awesome game with good graphics, a complete rip off of league of legends so if you like that game you\'ll love this!
reviews.author: Annie Nelson

reviews.title: Good game so far and graphics but...
reviews.comment: When i tried to get to the tower i lose 1/4-1/2 of my hp bar per wolf.why die easily?
reviews.author: Brandon Mullins

reviews.title: Better but
reviews.comment: Better but still needs a bit of working.. Like more info and such, control is still a little buggy and the graphics needs a bit of work on it.
reviews.author: Basil Tady

reviews.title: No
reviews.comment: Game looks decent, controls are fairly good, and it definitely looks like it could be a good game. Sadly, however, it\'s unplayable. The coin drop rate for the potions you\'ll need is a joke, there\'s no health/mana regen over time, and in the end, you\'ll need to use the IAP to progress. I play things like this all the time, and so far this game\'s a joke. You want a better game? Check out Ravensword: Shadowlands and the prequels. Devs, polish this game and I might reinstall. Good day.
reviews.author: Mike Zielinski

reviews.title: Take 2
reviews.comment: Well, here is Anagor again with the same quality graphics and thats it.  An extra star was earned because the game is not crashing and freezing the phone.  Some enjoyment can be found, but the UI is still cumbersome,  the combat is aweful, and the overall gameplay is boring. This is a really difficult genre for game development and the effort is noticeable, at least with the graphics. Also, when the game is completely stopped, the game continues to run in the background.  Not good team. Thanks.
reviews.author: Mark Toutant

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I love this game I haven\'t tried it yet but I liked the free one even though I couldn\'t get passed the first level until I got better and a good strategey
reviews.author: Xavier Jennings

reviews.title: Worst RPG on Android
reviews.comment: And that\'s a family with some real stinkers. This feels like a student project from early last decade. Level design is ugly, linear, simpleminded, and glitchy. Awful user interface with an unreadable gothic font chaser, terrible camera control constantly obscured by foreground foliage, arduous and apparently pointless archery, and instead of health/mana regeneration you pay in realtime for potions which you then have to \"equip\" (sigh). Gear is bought via a store which you apparently carry in your pocket, and no selling.
reviews.author: Ryan Smith-Roberts

reviews.title: Half baked game
reviews.comment: Very poor control. Unfreindly interface. Havent see such a poor quality game for a while.
reviews.author: Lin Young

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: I am unable to download this game I don\'t use the Wi-Fi is there any other way to download this game without using the Wi-Fi please reply me back I am dieing to play this game
reviews.author: Jaseem Shaikh

reviews.title: Always too difficult.
reviews.comment: Consider an option to: -Recover health over time -Dodge or block -Have Monsters drop more money As it is the monsters deal more damage than your ability to handle it. If we play it ends with the same result, again and again.  Please fix

reviews.comment: Very good...thumbs up

reviews.title: Needs updating
reviews.comment: The idea is ok but why don\'t update it so we don\'t have to keep looking for someone or something to kill to get coins to buy potions.

reviews.comment: Graphics is good. Camera control is weird. Movement controls not good. Game restarts when apps are switched. Last save is not loaded after death.

reviews.title: Closed
reviews.comment: Game closed after the loading screen. Need an optimization for device that has 512MB RAM...  ======================= I owned an Xperia sola
